title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 252: Featuring Kevin Bieksa
description:
On Thursday’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets the guys are joined by Kevin Bieksa. Kevin joins (43:43) to talk about his media career, his new podcast, some funny stories from his playing days and a bunch more. The guys also touch on all the news in the sports community surrounding Coronavirus and its impact on the hockey world. The boys also talk some NHL news, including some injuries, the LA Kings and Devils goalie MacKenzie Blackwood.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
